BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Day 1: Take a Harley Davidson to see the dolphins at Sea World, where you’ll have exclusive use of the attractions, then head to Queensland’s only revolving restaurant for a sumptuous seafood buffet with 360 degree views. You’ll take a helicopter ride to South Stradbroke Island to do what you wish - jet skiing, speedboat rides, paraflying, seaplane rides or four wheel drive tours are all on offer, before you kick back for a sunset dinner at McLarens Landing - then take a Tall Ship cruise back to the Gold Coast.

Day 2: Take off at dawn to float gently over the picturesque landscape in a hot air balloon and celebrate with a champagne breakfast. Head to the hinterland for a beautiful bushwalk and then after lunch the choice is yours - shopping, teeing off at one of the 40 world class golf courses, or indulging in high tea or a luxury spa. That evening, enjoy a unique dinner and show experience at the Australian Outback Spectacular - outback music, drama and action with over 40 stock horses and a three course Australian BBQ dinner.

Day 3: Breakfast with the real stars - Dreamworld’s tigers, crocodiles or koalas are your companions as the theme park is opened up exclusively for you to make the most of some of the tallest, fastest and wildest rides in the world. Then head to what the Gold Coast is famous for - some time on the beach with your own learn to surf class, or just swim, stroll or play. After lunch, visit Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary to interact with native Australian animals then discover more than 500 varieties of tropical fruits from around the world on a plantation safari at Tropical Fruit World. After admiring the sunset view from Mount Warning, you’ll be the star for the night, stepping out from your stretch hummer to walk down the red carpet at Warner Bros. Movie World.
